description: Inspired by famous 2D platformer games, RetroVamp will challenge every player to reach the top of a vertical map. By sliding, jumping and wall riding you will move around a map filled with obstacles, at every death you will be forced to start from the beginning or from one of the five checkpoints that you can spawn around the map.
name: Retrovamp
intro: A colorful retro-style hardcore platformer that will challenge every player to reach the top of a vertical scrolling scenario, easy to understand, hard to master!
